content: basic toe-up sock with a fleegle heel it is helpful to keep track of how many row are worked in each section so that the second sock can be identically replicated an efficient way to do this is to clip a bulb marker every 10 rounds if you are an average gauge knitter use us 1 40 or 32 for magic loop toe co 12 16 20 6 8 10 on each needle using turkish cast on or judy s magic cast on jane richmond has a good video on turkish cast on increase every round as follows until you have 44 52 60 sts 22 26 30 on each needle needle 1 k2 m1l knit until 2 sts remain m1r k2 needle 2 k2 m1l knit until 2 sts remain m1r k2 then increase as follows round 1 knit all stitch round 2 needle 1 k2 m1l knit to last 2 stitches m1r k2 needle 2 k2 m1l knit to last 2 stitches m1r k2 round 3 knit all stitch round 4 knit all stitch round 5 needle 1 k2 m1l knit to last 2 stitches m1r k2 needle 2 k2 m1l knit to last 2 stitches m1r k2 round 6 knit all stitch round 7 knit all stitch round 8 knit all stitch round 9 needle 1 k2 m1l knit to last 2 stitches m1r k2 needle 2 k2 m1l knit to last 2 stitches m1r k2 you should now have 56 64 72 sts 28 32 36 on each needle -or- if you would prefer to increase with kfb increase as follows needle 1 k1 kfb knit until 3 sts remain kfb k2 needle 2 k1 kfb knit until 3 sts remain kfb k2 then increase as follows round 1 knit all stitch round 2 needle 1 k1 kfb knit to last 3 stitches kfb k2 needle 2 k1 kfb knit to last 3 stitches kfb k2 round 3 knit all stitch round 4 knit all stitch round 5 needle 1 k1 kfb knit to last 3 stitches kfb k2 needle 2 k1 kfb knit to last 3 stitches kfb k2 round 6 knit all stitch round 7 knit all stitch round 8 knit all stitch round 9 needle 1 k1 kfb knit to last 3 stitches kfb k2 needle 2 k1 kfb knit to last 3 stitches kfb k2 continue in 2x2 ribbing on needle 1 only top or instep stitches and all knits on needle 2 sole of foot until desired length 21⁄4 21⁄2 23⁄4 inches short of the total desired foot length when measured from the cast-on for a more exact fit check out the worksheet on the last page of the pattern on how to determine foot length heel gusset round 1 needle 1 work in established 2x2 ribbing pattern round 1 needle 2 k1 m1l knit to last stitch m1r k1 2 sts increase or if you prefer kfb kfb knit to last stitch kfb k1 round 2 needle 1 work in
